### Research Template
```markdown
## Research Topic
What needs to be researched?

## Context
Why is this research needed?

## Research Questions
- [ ] Question 1
- [ ] Question 2

## Findings
AI research results

## Recommendations
What should we do based on research?

## Next Steps
Action items from research
```
